message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000. This is a one-time offer, so I hope you'll consider it seriously.
Alice, $12,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm only able to offer $9,500 at this time.  Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, I understand your concerns about the price, but I'm still confident that this product is worth a premium. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $11,000. This is a compromise that I'm willing to make to get the deal done. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but $11,000 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with.  I'm willing to go up to $10,500.  This is my final offer.

Hi Bob, I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, but I'm still not willing to go below $11,000. However, I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll meet you at $10,750. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
